title: Former U.S. prisoner in N. Korea speaks out
text:
Former U.S. prisoner in N. Korea speaks out Monday, May 07, 2018 - 01:53
Amid speculation that three Americans currently detained by North korea may soon be freed, Jeffrey Fowle, an American imprisoned in North Korea for almost six months in 2014, says he was ''walking on Cloud 9'' when he found out he was going home. He says the experience made him appreciate his life in the U.S. even more. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
